body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Dennis Watson and the customer's name is Amber Lewis.  The conversation is about Old Stone Stocks (a Brokerage Company ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Sarah, and I'm with Bright Solutions. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Sarah, I'm looking for some help with my account.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course! I'd be happy to help you with that. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. To assist you further, could you please provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! And could you also tell me the last four digits of your social security number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it is one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, John. I will now proceed to check your account.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Thank you for your time today, John. If you need anything else, feel free to reach out.
